body.name: LED Desk Lamp with Wireless Charger, USB Charging Port, Dimmable Eye-Caring Desk Light with 5 Brightness Levels & 5 Lighting Modes, Touch Control, Auto Timer (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 33 mins
features: EYE-CARING TECH: Shines a flicker-free light that brightens your space without harming your eyes; ideal for reading;working or studying
USB CHARGING PORT: Built in 5V2A USB charging port on the base, you can charge your mobile phones, tablets, kindle readers,and ather electronic devices when you're at work or sleep.
WIRELESS CHARGING BASE: Wireless charging is suitable for devices with QI wireless charging, note that 5V2A USB adapter is required.(included in the package)
MULTIPLE LIGHTING MODES & LIGHTING LEVELS: Desk lamp with 5 levels of brightness and 5 color temperature for different environments.
WORRY-FREE SERVICE: In case of any issues, simply reach out to us and we'll do all we can do to make it right. Click "Add to Cart" to get your lamp!
body.description: Auto Timer You no longer need to wake up in a deep sleep in order to turn off the lights, as the MCHATTE LED desk lamp has a humanized timing design to improve your lifestyle, so you don't have to worry about not turning it off during a long sleep. 5 color temperature Cold white White Natural light Yellow Warm yellow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Had it for a few months and it died.
reviews.reviewText: Light no longer works. I haven't had it that long, was plugged in, worked great for about 6 months. Didn't use it for a while because I wasn't at my desk often at night and found that it would not turn on. Tried to unplug it, checked all connections and plug/outlet and still didn't work. Never used it to charge my phone, just for a desk light. Was nice and bright until it wasn't. I really liked it, very disappointed it didn't last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I took a chance, but this thing ended up being perfect for my office.NOTE: If you need a lamp that sits behind a monitor and hangs over the top this might be a little short depending on your monitor height. Slightly shorter than my 24" on a stand. If you don't care about that then keep reading...This is GREAT - not one bad thing to say about it -It's a lot more solid/durable feeling and attractive than I anticipated -Base is about the size of an 7 inch tablet pc - nice small footprint on my desk -The hues are very tasteful - I've found a few of them very nice for my desk ambience -Despite other reviews, the brightness is great. -Versatility - LOVE the swivel/position adjustment capabilities. -Wireless phone charger seems to work as advertised although I don't use itI have a pretty dark office, and my primary goal was to get a lamp/lighting source on my desk that I could also use to see the keys on the musical keyboard next to the desk. Wow I could not have picked out anything better. Attached photos should speak for themselves...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product, Well worth the the price.
reviews.reviewText: I bought two lamps. They function nearly flawlessly. No heat, adjustable brightness, light weight. The only glitch is with 1 of the lamps USB charger. The plug has to be just right or the charging function will not function. The other works fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the money
reviews.reviewText: I bought this one because it was cheaper than the Bluetooth version, but I have no regrets. It’s a great desk lamp and I use it all the time. No issues so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I bought this lamp for a desk. Overall the item works well. The light is sufficient but not super bright. I am not use the timer function. It does come with magnetic charger but if you have a case on your phone it does not work. I would have liked a USB charger built-in but I guess you don’t need it with the magnetic charger. Overall I’m pretty happy with it. Very slim Arm and frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: When I first saw this lamp I got very exited, nice modern lamp with multiple light settings, a timer and a wireless charger for my phone!! And well priced. My first lamp wireless charger stopped working within a week so I got a replacement from Amazon, the 2nd lamp wireless charger lasted about three weeks before it too stopped working. I contact Amazon who advised me I was outside the 30 day window to return it and I needed to contact the seller..When I contacted the seller via a link provided by Amazon I asked if I can get a replacement, their answer a day later was “of course” and nothing else so I asked again how do we do the replacement, do I need to ship it first, do I get a shipping label, how does it work?, a day later the answer was, “use the Amazon return window” and nothing else, I reply again that I don’t understand what you mean Amazon sent me to you for the transaction, another day goes by and there answer was “is in your order”.Even though the seller was answering they were providing as little information as possible and did not seem they wanted to help. I contacted Amazon explained the situation and asked for a refund. I will not buy anything from them ever again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I was hoping it would be for my home office. I was kind of expecting to be disappointed about something or another with it, but it's everything they advertised and works great! Super sleek design and delivers lovely, even light everywhere under the light bar. I love the temperature adjustment...provides lots of variation for my workspace. The brightness goes from very dim to bright with an easy touch of the interface.My only criticisms are:1. The wireless charger isn't quite strong enough to charge my work iPhone through the Otter Box case. It looks like it can ALMOST do it (the charging indicator blinks) but not quite. I've just removed the case while I'm at home with the phone and the problem is solved.2. I wish the platform to charge the phone was slightly raised to lift the phone away from the touch controls. The controls get pressed by the phone when you're charging if you don't place the phone perpendicular to the base. But if you can get your phone to charge away from the controls, you're good.All in all, REALLY happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wireless charger does not work with newer phones
reviews.reviewText: This lamp over all is good product. We have the iPhone 12 and it would not charge it. We aren’t returning it because it is good quality lamp. Just wished it worked with new style phones
Very good lamp. Like the adjustable brightness and wireless phone charger. Max brightness could be a little higher, otherwise very happy with that purchase.

A good reading lamp in its own right, but also has some great features, like the ability to adjust the brightness and to charge you phone, both with qi or wire. The haptic response of the buttons is very good and the brightness is good. A really great lamp.
Just what I needed for my desk. Good light. Wireless charger a bonus

Modern looking, small foot print, sturdy, can chnage colour temperature and brightness. Swivels to almost any postion. No light on eyes or refecting off the PC screen. You can charge you phone. Just 7 watts of power - love it

reviews.reviewTitle: Cannot charge a phone and use lamp
reviews.reviewText: Light flickers when charging so you cannot do both at the same time. The light setting changes randomly when left on for an extended time. Cheap product.
